item.title: FireFox Privacy Script: Automate Enhanced Security & Privacy
item.description: Enhance the security and privacy of your FireFox browser with this automated script based on suggestions from PrivacyTools.io and ffprofile.

item.title: Privacy Policy: Information Collection, Usage, and Consent | SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "privacy policy" , "information collection" , "data usage" , "visitor consent" , "online privacy" , "personal information" , "contact information" , "website usage" , "communication" , "marketing" , "cookies" , "web beacons" , "log files" , "third-party privacy policies" , "data protection" , "GDPR" , "CCPA" , "children's privacy" , "online activity monitoring"
item.description: Learn how SimeonOnSecurity collects, uses, and protects visitor information through its comprehensive Privacy Policy, ensuring consent and online privacy.
